reviewText: This is one of my all time favorite movies. I've seen it at least 20 times and each time I've watched it, I've liked it even more. It's funny, it's romantic, it's sexy, and it's so very Brazilian. The musical score is haunting, and Sonia Braga is at her most beautiful. If you love Rio, you will love this movie.
This film is a masterpiece of the story of the brasilian cinema, Sonia Braga is very sexy and sensual, the story is very intresting, one of the best I see from this country.
